extendedInfo.description: CompuLEAD Smart is the most powerful and easiest way for Exhibitors to capture sales leads on the tradeshow floor â using your own iPhone! Youâll also have access to your leads in real time on BuyerConnect, CompuSystems premier lead follow-up service. Capture Leads: â¢ Enter the number found on an attendeeâs badge into the app and receive that attendeeâs full contact information instantly. â¢ Edit lead contact information and add notes using the iPhoneâs keyboard. â¢ Qualify your leads with 10 standard qualifiers, or create your own custom qualifiers or survey questions. â¢ Newly updated Lead Reports.â¢ Improved offline mode. â¢ Send electronic sales literature to leads. â¢ View appointment requests sent by Attendees, which can be accepted or cancelledâ¢ BuyerConnect button is available that takes exhibitors to their specific BuyerConnect website. BuyerConnect is CompuSystemsâ premier lead follow-up tool. â¢ Easy update of current qualifiers and surveys by simply tapping a button. â¢ Displays show messages from the Show Organizer.Manage Leads: â¢ Search for a captured lead by contact or company name, or scroll through your leads in the order in which they were taken, by last name or by company name. â¢ After searching for a lead you can view contact information, selected qualifiers, survey answers and notes. Any of this data can then be edited or added to. Previous Eventâs Leads: â¢ View leads captured by CompuLEAD Smart at a previous event anytime on your iPhone by event name. â¢ See if a current showâs lead had been captured at a previous event, and view the past contact information and qualifications. BuyerConnect: â¢ View a report of all the leads collected by your company in real-time. â¢ Send a broadcast follow-up email to your lead list â HTML or plain text. â¢ Create up to five different reports to help measure show ROI. Please note that there is a fee to activate this application for use on Trade Shows where the CompuLEAD Smart is being offered. Activation is charged on a Per-Show basis.

reviews.comment: Great tool for conventions run by Compusystems
reviews.author: Jeff Kehl
